official_title: A bill to designate Lincoln's Birthday as a legal public holiday and to provide that, for purposes of pay and leave, Federal employees may select either Lincoln's Birthday or Washington's Birthday as a legal public holiday.

summary.text: Designates Lincoln's Birthday, February 12, as a legal public holiday. Authorizes Federal employees to select either Lincoln's Birthday or Washington's Birthday, the third Monday in February, as a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A bill to designate Lincoln's Birthday as a legal public holiday and to provide that, for purposes of pay and leave, Federal employees may select either Lincoln's Birthday or Washington's Birthday as a legal public holiday.
